channel.title: Mortal Online info (picture-heavy thread)
channel.description:
Alright, the game is getting closer to release, NDA is dropped and i can finally post pics nd shit to public!!
There will also be an open beta before release so all u doubters will have a chance to criticize it to the best of your ability!
A very interesting thing is that at the current state of the beta (around 10k people) i have yet to be ganked/attacked by another player! Most people are very civilized, this is pretty much a proof FFA-pvp can work without people ganking you all the time.
Mature playerbase <3
First up, some pics from developers @ office:
[img]http://www.mortalonline.com/files/Blog/programmers.jpg[/img] [img]http://www.mortalonline.com/files/Blog/artists.jpg[/img] [img]http://www.mortalonline.com/files/Blog/emil_desk.jpg[/img]
Yes, they are a bunch of fukin nerds
Next up, some actual in-game screenshots:
Race-selection: [img]http://i49.tinypic.com/2nty553.jpg[/img]
Ancestry-selection (ancestry is basically a way of mixing various races so that you will get a custom look and attributes): [img]http://i48.tinypic.com/oa55zo.jpg[/img]
HITLER IN CHARACTER CREATION OMG [img]http://i50.tinypic.com/2uj3wbs.jpg[/img]
A little note: Housing is destructible, however it would take a single person over 1 week to destroy it alone, you'd need a huge group of people to do it.
A player-made house design finished: [img]http://i49.tinypic.com/330eagp.jpg[/img]
A player-made house under construction (a guy with his mount to the right of it as well): [img]http://i47.tinypic.com/66w0mf.jpg[/img]
Interior of a house with a guildstone in it (for management of a guild etc): [img]http://i46.tinypic.com/t5mzwj.jpg[/img]
Some guy with his home-crafted scale armor and a weapon to go with it (keep in mind you can craft armor as you wish, the insanely awesome crafting combination system has been in for months): [img]http://i48.tinypic.com/242e8vb.jpg[/img]
Some people building a guild-city in the wilderness: [img]http://i47.tinypic.com/209frww.jpg[/img]
The skill-interface (work-in-progress and not final, hence why it's slightly confusing. All those things to the right are categories and not skills, so there are subskills under them): [img]http://i46.tinypic.com/2r6zeo9.jpg[/img]
Picture of the category gathering. This skill will raise if you do actions such as woodcutting and mining (more will be available later): [img]http://i47.tinypic.com/2zoc6zq.jpg[/img]
Picture of sausage lake. The origin of that name was a bug in early beta where people would login only to find themselves in a big lake naked and dying: [img]http://i46.tinypic.com/1zdrcr6.jpg[/img]
Landscape screenshot: [img]http://i45.tinypic.com/zx3z84.jpg[/img]
Now for some videos:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZJFXaYbdGwE - Video of a walkthrough on one of the capital cities http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZCzUY5JDFDc - Some guy goes apeshit and attacks people in town
That's about it for now.

item.title: Mortal Online info (picture-heavy thread)
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

the fu superior:

How much will this cost?

$15 a month, $30 up front I believe. I can’t remember how much I paid, but I think it was around $70.
I just noticed my pictures were removed in the roll back, repost.



^ looked better before the shade moved, but forgot to screenshot

^ friend didn’t believe about full nudity
Darn, I really want to get back into beta, but busy with exams/papers…

Read full topic

item.title: Mortal Online info (picture-heavy thread)
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

[quote=“Speljohan, post:15, topic:316898”][quote author=Mopman link=topic=413467.msg3045893#msg3045893 date=1259458767]
Lack of PVP is proof FFA PVP works?
[/quote]There’s plenty of pvp, but people mostly have honour.

[quote author=xEnt link=topic=413467.msg3045885#msg3045885 date=1259458578]

Lolgraphicswhore

For one, these graphics are on medium settings, high and extreme will be in on launch.
Secondly, graphics means nothing when gameplay beats every cookie-cutter mmo out there.

same thing u said about darkfall, and well it sure fell to a dark place.
[/quote][quote author=Speljohan link=topic=413467.msg3045833#msg3045833 date=1259457103]

[quote author=Original Daniel link=topic=413467.msg3045666#msg3045666 date=1259451888]
aoc and darkfall were supposed to be good too, i gave up trying to find a good mmo ages ago
[/quote]darkfall wasn’t that bad, just too pvp-oriented.
[/quote][/quote]

only closed beta nerds have “honor,”. When it becomes public this may not be the case.

Read full topic

item.title: Mortal Online info (picture-heavy thread)
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“sanga282, post:9, topic:316898”][quote author=Speljohan link=topic=413467.msg3045465#msg3045465 date=1259442726]

meh looks like nothing special so far, i’ll try it in open beta if i can
[/quote]pls tell me wut other mmo’s have ffa pvp, 100% player-driven economy, player housing, crafting system with 140k diff combinations of weapons, skill-based progression system, no minimap, no names above heads, progression that doesn’t have to revolve around combat, mount system where your mount can be killed, you can fall off from low skill, no artifical boundries in the world, walk where you want.

I’d love to hear a game with that

mmo’s are just boring period its same shit over and over again[/quote]Yes, the AAA-mmo’s are boring and the same shit over and over again. This is why SANDBOX MMO’S ARE NEEDED!

I don’t play mmo’s, i will play this because it’s a LIVING WORLD MADE BY PLAYERS and not a linear grind for “MAX LVL” and “EPICS”

Read full topic

I’d love to hear a game with that :)[/quote]
mmo’s are just boring period its same shit over and over again

item.title: Mortal Online info (picture-heavy thread)
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

Alright, the game is getting closer to release, NDA is dropped and i can finally post pics nd shit to public!!

There will also be an open beta before release so all u doubters will have a chance to criticize it to the best of your ability!

A very interesting thing is that at the current state of the beta (around 10k people) i have yet to be ganked/attacked by another player! Most people are very civilized, this is pretty much a proof FFA-pvp can work without people ganking you all the time.

Mature playerbase <3

First up, some pics from developers @ office:



Yes, they are a bunch of fukin nerds

Next up, some actual in-game screenshots:

Race-selection:

Ancestry-selection (ancestry is basically a way of mixing various races so that you will get a custom look and attributes):

HITLER IN CHARACTER CREATION OMG

A little note: Housing is destructible, however it would take a single person over 1 week to destroy it alone, you’d need a huge group of people to do it.

A player-made house design finished:

330eagp.jpg600×805

A player-made house under construction (a guy with his mount to the right of it as well):

66w0mf.jpg800×493

Interior of a house with a guildstone in it (for management of a guild etc):

t5mzwj.jpg960×720

Some guy with his home-crafted scale armor and a weapon to go with it (keep in mind you can craft armor as you wish, the insanely awesome crafting combination system has been in for months):

242e8vb.jpg1000×250

Some people building a guild-city in the wilderness:

The skill-interface (work-in-progress and not final, hence why it’s slightly confusing. All those things to the right are categories and not skills, so there are subskills under them):

Picture of the category gathering. This skill will raise if you do actions such as woodcutting and mining (more will be available later):

Picture of sausage lake. The origin of that name was a bug in early beta where people would login only to find themselves in a big lake naked and dying:

Landscape screenshot:

Now for some videos:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZJFXaYbdGwE - Video of a walkthrough on one of the capital cities
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZCzUY5JDFDc - Some guy goes apeshit and attacks people in town

That’s about it for now.
